Auditions and Rehearsals

Rigorous — We hold volunteers to a high musical standard while offering a welcoming, inclusive environment.

Revealing — Auditions help us learn who you are: strength, range, and interpretive voice.

Reflective — Rehearsals are focused, collaborative, and rooted in shared musical goals.

Volunteer Commitment — Members commit time to rehearsals and may receive profit-based compensation for certain events.

Rehearsal Expectations — Read music in advance, attend regularly, and keep a professional attitude.
